website_summaries.verdict: Large capacity model offers good flexibility at a very competitive price.
pros: No-frills budget model offers similar power and capacity to more expensive machines, with wide cooking temperature range, and convenient 60 minute timer
cons: Some find it’s not as fast as suggested

customer_reviews.title: Keeps blowing the fuses!
customer_reviews.text: That’s three fuses blown now and I have only had the air fryer for 4 weeks! Shocking! Absolutely useless having part cooked food as it stops half way through when the fuse blows. Replaced one which lasted all of 30 seconds. I called Amazon who sent me a return label. I dropped the item off at the post office and almost immediately received my refund. Really pleased with Amazon’s customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Brooks

customer_reviews.title: It cooks fast.
customer_reviews.text: It easy to use for Friday's Fish & Chips rather than the oven, as there is less oil on the plate. I have used it for my grandsons lunches or a quick snack, as it saves with standing in front of the cooker. It cannot fit large pieces of frozen food as this size is too small, you would have to buy a larger size. Haven't used it for raw/fresh food only frozen items.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Fryer
customer_reviews.text: Once we had the dials sorted out and the button that frees the inner tray we found it really easy to use and have tried out lots of things to try out. Bhajis worked well, Chips looked a little pale in places but tasted good and cooked through. I messed up falafel but I think the mix was too dry or we cooked it too long, Will try again. Wife happy I bought it.Easy to clean. Just wipe down with damp cloth Good for a 2 person household. Not sure about larger families
customer_reviews.author: B. S. Barker

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so my family could still enjoy the foods they like just healthier like fried chicken. Wow this air fryer is amazing it is so easy to use. It all comes apart easy and quickly for cleaning. I have cooked everything in it from fried chicken to jacket potatos it leaves food crispy, juicy and all the fat goes in the bottom . I have recommended this to everyone 👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Abbie-louise Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Not all its cracked up to be
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had sent this back - have used it twice ... now its just collecting dust. Either I'm not using it right or it is just pants 1st go at making chips - disaster 2nd go at making chips - figured out you have to shake them, but when you try to put the drawer back in ... you have to wait for it to cool a bit otherwise it wont fit !! and it is so hot to touch you need to use a cloth to hold the main bit when trying to put the drawer back in
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: I love this item I often burn food in my oven by not timing properly but this method is quick and easy. It is great for frying chips with very little oil I just pour a bit of oil into a dish and soake my raw chips in it then romve them and put them into the air fryer.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie Ant

customer_reviews.title: Really happy
customer_reviews.text: I’m really happy and impressed with the product! I’ve made some homemade fried chicken and potato wedges and both turn out amazing! It can also be used to heat up some pastry as well !
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Started peeling away
customer_reviews.text: The air fryer worked well until the protective layer started to peel off. Returned and refunded
customer_reviews.author: BABUDDIN AHMED

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Handle screws loosened and came of whilst lifting the item. Very disappointed with quality. Had to turn very frequently as good would over cook on top.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend this  Air fryer .
customer_reviews.text: This product worked better than expected . It doesn’t come with the accessories and I have had to buy these separately . Would definitely recommend this item .
customer_reviews.author: Sharda

customer_reviews.title: Really impressed
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with this hot air fryer. So easy to use. Cleans in a few seconds. And produces good food. The timer is simple to use and the temperature control like wise is easy to set.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect chip cooker
customer_reviews.text: Chips are cooked perfect with this and no fat needed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Faulty product,  screws fell out into the food
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product in May, and I'm returning it after just 2 months, after having only used it a moderate amount (a few times a week). Several screws from inside the fryer fell out, from behind the heating element into the food. Luckily we spotted this before eating the food... I've had another air fryer from another brand for several years and never had this issue, so this was very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Cox

customer_reviews.title: Great chips
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. Thought I would try an air fryer as I need to replace my chip pan. Was worried about the quality of chips but they have been great so far. Best thing is no smell of oil and easy to clean.

customer_reviews.title: Please do not buy

customer_reviews.title: Good chips
customer_reviews.text: This is ideal for 2 people , it could be a bit small for a family. We bought this to replace our Tefal air fryer which after 6 years packed in. It's not as easy to clean as the Tefal but is still a good product and makes nice chips.

It's so much quicker that the main cooker. It's really to use, just put the temperature dial to where you want it and turn the timer on and that's it on!

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT.
customer_reviews.text: Love this so easy to use and easy to keep clean,and my kids can use it safely and securely without them burning themselves,I'd rather my 14byear old uses this than an oven,plus your chips are really nice and crispy and the best thing is you don't need to use oil or anything.. Very Highly Recommend. Definitely worth the price and more. So if you're interested go ahead buy one you won't be disappointed..

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't I buy my parnter one of these before?
customer_reviews.text: My partner had been wanting one for some time and I decided to buy her one, rather than plain old oven chips and fryer not being an option, due to the kids running around. Amazing product, great tasting chips, not had oven chips since we got this, my only regret is not buying one years ago.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Tower air fryer is very good easy to use and and quick cooking, you just turn it on once the time is up its ready to eat, the reason that I rated 4 stars its because non stick is not very good its now peeling off, if you cook meat or fish it is hard to come off.

customer_reviews.title: First time user

Bonus electricity bill has been reduced by £25 a month, cos I don't use my oven nearly as much as I used to, no waiting for the oven to heat up......baked potatoes are lush made in it

product_meta.title: Tower T17022 Air Fryer with 30 Minute Manual Timer, 1500 W, 4.3 Litre, Black
product_meta.description:
Eliminate the excess fat associated with frying and create a range of delicious meals using the hot air circulation technology of the 4.3 Litre Tower air fryer. With only a small amount of low calorie cooking spray the enhanced airflow creates a crispy texture as it fries across a range of ingredients, including vegetables, chicken, chips and cakes. It's also very easy to clean, as the pull out drawer and removable basket require just a simple hand wash to clean. It's the ideal kitchen accessory if you want to make your mealtimes that much better.

BOX CONTAINS
1 x Tower Air Fryer 4.3 L; 1 x Instruction Booklet
feature_bullets: Healthier cooking: With the use of rapid air circulation technology and a low calorie cooking spray, you can fry without the excess fat associated with traditional frying and in a reduced time
Temperature control: The adjustable dial ranges between 80 - 200 Degree so you can easily cook a variety of meals, including vegetables, chips, chicken and cake
4.3 Litre capacity: The large cooking basket provides ample space for baking, grilling and frying a wide range of ingredients
60 minute timer: Conveniently schedule the cooking cycle and the air fryer will automatically switch off once completed
Detachable compartments: The pull out drawer and removable basket require only a simple hand wash to clean
Comes with 1 year guarantee, get extended 2 years warranty upon registration

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars249 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
